name: safe-skill
description: A safe example skill with pure Python. No network, no shell, no env.
usage_summary:
# safe-skill

A safe example skill with pure Python.

## Install

```bash
clawhub install safe-skill
```

name: get_weather
description: Fetches current weather for a city using the Open-Meteo public API (HTTP GET).

# get_weather

Fetches weather via Open-Meteo API.
